title: Location
description: Schema defining metadata for OpenAQ locations

altitude.title: Altitude
altitude.description: The altitude of the location in meters

sourceType.title: Source type
sourceType.description: The source of the instruments at the location. Government instruments are deployed by or on behalf of governmental bodies. Research instruments are deployed by researchers affiliated with universities and/or research organizations. Other instruments are deployed by citizen scientists, often low-cost instruments

activationDate.title: Activation date
activationDate.description: Date the instruments were activated at this location, stored as an ISO timestamp

deactivationDate.title: Deactivation date
deactivationDate.description: Date the instruments were deactivated at this location, stored as an ISO timestamp

active.title: Active
active.description: Whether the location is currently active

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Any relevant notes about the location

attribution.title: Attributions
attribution.description: Data attribution in descending order of prominence

instruments.title: Instruments
instruments.description: An array of instruments installed at this location

rawFrequency.title: Raw frequency
rawFrequency.description: The raw sampling frequency of the instrument in milliseconds

reportingFrequency.title: Reporting frequency
reportingFrequency.description: The reporting sampling frequency of the instrument in milliseconds

inletHeight.title: Inlet height
inletHeight.description: Height of intake inlet in meters

activationDate.title: Instrument activation date
activationDate.description: Date the instrument was activated at this location, stored as an ISO timestamp

deactivationDate.title: Instrument deactivation date
deactivationDate.description: Date the instrument was deactivated at this location, stored as an ISO timestamp

active.title: Active
active.description: Whether the location is currently active

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Any relevant notes about the instrument
